definition: character (computing) (Tw)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
character set

sentences.english: A non-zero value specifies the maximum number of characters that can be parsed.
sentences.chinese: 非零的值指定可剖析的最大字元數。

sentences.english: Characters are escaped with a backslash automatically.
sentences.chinese: 字元都會被自動加上一個反斜線進行轉義。

sentences.english: Here the characters are listed that you have missed during the typing test.
sentences.chinese: 這裏字元是表列的那個您有缺少的在時型態中測試。

sentences.english: Programs that require the ability to send or receive control characters have an environmental dependency.
sentences.chinese: 需要收發控制字元的程式是環境相依的。

sentences.english: Shows the number of characters allowed for character-based data types.
sentences.chinese: 顯示以字元爲基礎的資料型別可允許的字元數。

sentences.english: Shows the number of characters allowed for character-based data types.
sentences.chinese: 顯示以字元爲基礎的資料型別可允許的字元數。

sentences.english: You can combine several single characters to form a longer expression.
sentences.chinese: 您可結合一些單一字元以形成較長的運算式。

sentences.english: Each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap.
sentences.chinese: 使用字元的圖像點陣圖繪製每個字元。

sentences.english: Each character is drawn using its glyph bitmap.
sentences.chinese: 使用字元的圖像點陣圖繪製每個字元。

sentences.english: The current position of the insertion cursor in chars.
sentences.chinese: 遊標目前的位置，以字元表示。

sentences.english: You can only type up to260characters in the box.
sentences.chinese: 只能在該框中鍵入最多260個字元。

sentences.english: A wide character is a 2-byte multilingual character code.
sentences.chinese: 寬字元是兩個位元組雙語字元碼。

sentences.english: A wide character is a 2-byte multilingual character code.
sentences.chinese: 寬字元是兩個位元組雙語字元碼。

sentences.english: A non-zero value specifies the maximum number of characters that can result from expanding entities.
sentences.chinese: 非零的值指定可產生自展開實體的最大字元數。

sentences.english: The invalid characters are translated into escaped numeric entity encodings.
sentences.chinese: 無效的字元會轉譯成逸出數字實體編碼方式。
